summary:
### **Dividend Notification Summary (Appendix 3A.1)**  
- **Dividend Type**: Ordinary, unfranked  
- **Amount**: **NZD 0.1325** per share (~AUD 0.1229)  
- **Key Dates**:  
  - Ex-date: **11/6/2025**  
  - Record date: **12/6/2025**  
  - Payment date: **2/7/2025**  
- **DRP Strike Price**: **NZD 10.42983548** per share (2% discount applied)  
- **DRP Election Deadline**: **13/6/2025, 15:00 NZ time**  
- **Withholding Tax**: 15% for non-residents  
- **Tax Details**: Fully unfranked; tax component info [here](https://infratil.com/for-investors/dividends-and-performance/).  

**No other material information identified.**
